content: अपसृप् {c1c} <ab>P.</ab> {@--1@} To glide or move gently along, glide away or off. {@--2@} To withdraw, retire, go away; त्वरितमनेन तरुगहनेनापसर्पत <ls>U. 4</ls>; उत्प्रेक्षितविकारः अपसर्पेत <ls>Mv. 4</ls> retire, go into voluntary exile. {@--3@} To observe closely (as a spy); शुद्धांतचारी दुर्मुखः स मया पौरजानपदानपसर्पितुं प्रयुक्तः <ls>U. 1.</ls> {%--<ab>Caus.</ab>%} To drive away or off.
